thread.title: Latest News | Biting Cold Grips Punjab, Haryana
thread.title_full: Latest News | Biting Cold Grips Punjab, Haryana

author: PTI
title: Latest News | Biting Cold Grips Punjab, Haryana
text:
Chandigarh, Dec 13 (PTI) Sangrur in Punjab and Haryana's Hisar reeled under severe cold on Friday as biting chill continued to prevail at many places in the two states.
According to the meteorological department's daily weather report, Sangrur recorded a minimum temperature of 1.1 degrees Celsius.
Also Read | [Kolkata Fatafat Result Today: Kolkata FF Result for December 13, 2024 Declared, Check Winning Numbers and Result Chart of Satta Matka-Type Lottery Game.](https://www.latestly.com/india/information/kolkata-fatafat-result-today-kolkata-ff-result-for-december-13-2024-declared-check-winning-numbers-and-result-chart-of-satta-matka-type-lottery-game-6485885.html)
Among other places in Punjab, severe chill swept Faridkot, which recorded a low of 2.5 degrees, while Bathinda recorded a minimum of 4.4 degrees Celsius.
Amritsar also experienced a cold night at 3.8 degrees Celsius while Ludhiana recorded a low of 6.3 degrees Celsius. Patiala recorded a low of 7 degrees Celsius.
Also Read | [RRB JE Exam 2024 Admit Card Out at rrbapply.gov.in: Hall Ticket for 7,951 Junior Engineer Posts CBT 1 Examination Released, Know Steps To Download.](https://www.latestly.com/india/information/rrb-je-exam-2024-admit-card-out-at-rrbapply-gov-in-hall-ticket-for-7951-junior-engineer-posts-cbt-1-examination-released-know-steps-to-download-6485814.html)
Meanwhile, in Haryana, Hisar was the coldest place recording a low of 1.7 degrees Celsius.
Piercing cold also swept Narnaul, which recorded a low of 3.8 degrees Celsius.
Karnal recorded a low of 6.2 degrees Celsius, Bhiwani 4.6 degrees Celsius, Sirsa 6.8 degrees Celsius, Rohtak 8.8 degrees Celsius while Ambala registered a low of 8.5 degrees Celsius.
Chandigarh, the common capital of Haryana and Punjab, recorded a minimum temperature of 7.6 degrees Celsius.
(This is an unedited and auto-generated story from Syndicated News feed, LatestLY Staff may not have modified or edited the content body)
